displayName.text: Gentle Touch Dental, P.C. Dr. Monika Kurzatkowski

formattedAddress: 50 Park Ave Suite 1G, New York, NY 10016, USA
adrFormatAddress: 50 Park Ave Suite 1G, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text:
Dr. Kurzatkowski is amazing! She accommodated me for an early appointment and fixed a broken tooth in a blink of an eye! Her work is impeccable! 100/10
Thank you Dr. Monika!

text.text:
Dr. Kurzatkowski is amazing! She accommodated me for an early appointment and fixed a broken tooth in a blink of an eye! Her work is impeccable! 100/10
Thank you Dr. Monika!

originalText.text: Professional, efficient, and painless. Went to 4 different dentists in the city before finally finding someone I can trust. Dr. Kurzatkowski makes everything super easy and won’t try to convince you to waste money on excessive procedures.

text.text: Professional, efficient, and painless. Went to 4 different dentists in the city before finally finding someone I can trust. Dr. Kurzatkowski makes everything super easy and won’t try to convince you to waste money on excessive procedures.

originalText.text: I can't recommend Dr. Kurzatkowski enough. Both she and her assistant Edita were perfectly professional, knowledgeable, and just plain good at their jobs. I felt comfortable and well taken care of from the moment I stepped in the office until the moment I stepped out. If you like good dental care and kind people, look no further.

text.text: I can't recommend Dr. Kurzatkowski enough. Both she and her assistant Edita were perfectly professional, knowledgeable, and just plain good at their jobs. I felt comfortable and well taken care of from the moment I stepped in the office until the moment I stepped out. If you like good dental care and kind people, look no further.

originalText.text: Monika impressed me with her dental knowledge and she helped me discover a lot of issues I had not seen before I met her. She is so far the best dentist I have been seeing in my life: extremely knowledgeable, patient and  provides excellent service as well problem solving. I would definitely recommend her.

She is so far the best dentist I have been seeing in my life: extremely knowledgeable, patient and  provides excellent service as well problem solving. I would definitely recommend her.

originalText.text: Love working with Dr. Kurzatkowski---thorough, thoughtful, talented and efficient.  One of the best dentists I've ever met!

text.text: Love working with Dr. Kurzatkowski---thorough, thoughtful, talented and efficient.  One of the best dentists I've ever met!
